summary: Hydrochloric acid (HCl) is a strong, colorless acid with a strong smell. It's made by dissolving hydrogen chloride in water. You might know it as muriatic acid or spirits of salt. This acid is found in your stomach, helping with digestion, and is also used in labs and industries. It's very useful, but remember, it's an acid, so it can be dangerous if not handled properly! Always be careful when working with chemicals.
title: Hydrochloric acid
